comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of brownies made
- y: number of lemon squares made

Extracted Constraints:
- 5x + 7y \leq 2500 (chocolate mix constraint)
- 4x + 6y \leq 3300 (lemon mix constraint)
- y \geq x (more lemon squares than brownies)
- x \geq 0 (non-negativity constraint)
- y \geq 0 (non-negativity constraint)
- x \geq 0.4(x+y) (at least 40% of items made must be brownies)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize 4x + 6y (total amount of fiber needed)
